thread.title: Paris Parfait
thread.title_full: Paris Parfait - Review of Le Meurice, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: johnkrueger
title: Paris Parfait
text:
Ok, first trip to Paris. Choose the best 5 star hotel next to the garden, next to the Louvre. Next to the Eiffel Tower. Next to everything. Upgrade to a Suite with a view of said garden, Louvre and Tower. Sprawl out of the balcony and marvel at the lights on the Eiffel Tower at night. Wake up one morning and watch the Paris Marathon run by. Meet the winners in the lobby later. Make your daughter's top 2 experiences in her life. Visit the famous chocolate shop down the street, too often.That's the Paris Parfait. Indulge!
Room Tip: Get a Suite with a view of the Eiffel Tower. Live a little! See more room tips
